segments.text: Hi , Tom . You forgot to put on your sports shoes ! It's Games Day today !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , I have them in my bag . I'Il put them on right away !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me give you a hand . You are carrying so many books .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: No , I haven't . I've tried hard to remember and I'm quite sure I've memorized the rhythm correctly .
segments.speaker: S2
